channel.title: Teaching on Jimi Oke
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Jimi Oke

item.title: Teaching
item.description: CEE 697M: Big Data and Machine Learning for Engineers This is a graduate course that delves into the theory of machine learning, broadly divided into supervised learning, unsupervised learning and neural networks. Slides and course material are available here. Semesters taught: Spring 2020 CEE 260/MIE 273: Probability and Statistics for Engineers This is a core undergraduate course for civil/mechanical/industrial engineering majors at UMass Amherst. Semesters taught: Fall 2019, Fall 2020
